tool_description:
Introducing: German Property Insights API

The German Property Insights API is a cutting-edge service that provides you with comprehensive, up-to-date information on rental and sales prices for houses and apartments across various cities in Germany. With monthly to quarterly updates, you'll have access to the most current data, ensuring you make informed decisions in the dynamic real estate market.
name: Immopti
